item.title: Probing critical phenomena in open quantum systems using atom arrays
item.author: Fang Fang
item.content:encoded:
At continuous phase transitions, quantum many-body systems exhibit complex, emergent behavior. Most notably, at a quantum critical point, correlations decay as a power law, with exponents determined by a set of universal scaling dimensions. ...
